subject: Re: Breakthru College: Follow up regarding Pipedrive sync

Hi Ina,

Thanks for the call earlier and happy holidays to you and your team!

We took a look at the website backend to see why the forms aren't syncing to Pipedrive. It looks like the site is using a tool called Zapier to bridge that connection (rather than a direct plugin inside WordPress).

Since we didn't set up this specific integration originally, we don't have access to the external Zapier account where the connection actually lives. However, if you have access to that account, it is usually a quick fix on that end.

Here is exactly what to check inside Zapier:
  1. Log in to Zapier.com.
  2. Check the "Zap": Look for the integration named something like "Gravity Forms to Pipedrive" on your dashboard. Make sure the toggle switch is set to "On".
  3. Check for Errors: On the left menu, click "Zap History". If you see any red "Stopped" or "Error" statuses next to recent dates, clicking on them will tell you exactly why the sync stopped.
  4. Reconnect Pipedrive: Often, the connection just times out for security. Go to "Apps" (or "My Apps") in the menu, find Pipedrive, and see if there is a button that says "Reconnect".

Hopefully, one of those steps gets things running smoothly again!
